name: A Circuitous And Wending Journey
effect:
Push up to half (round up) of Invaders from target land.
Do likewise (separately) for {dahan}, {presence}, and {beast}.

effect:
Remove up to half (round down) of {beast} in target land.

For each {beast} Removed, 2 {fear} and skip one Invader Action.

name:
A Year Of 
Perfect Stillness
effect:
Invaders skip all Actions
in target land this turn.

name: Absolute Stasis
effect:
*Cost to Use:* 1 Time.

Until the end of the {slow} phase, target land and everything in it cease to exist for all purposes except checking victory/defeat.

(You cannot target into, out of, or through where the land was.)

This cannot target an Ocean even if Oceans are in play.
title: Absolute Stasis

name: Absorb Corruption

threshold.effectText: You may do both.

effect:

Remove 1 {blight}.

If invaders are present: 
they Build, then Ravage.

 Add 1 {dahan}. Push up to 2 {dahan}.

You may repeat this Power (once)
 on the same land by spending 1 Time.

Boon Of Ancient
